    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"

>
[Slayer's Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3482) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 29</row>

**Archetype** [Undead Slayer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=174)

**Prerequisites**
[Frighten Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=3479)

</column>

---

Your very presence strikes fear into the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). When you use [Slayer's Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=3474) and succeed at your check, you can Frighten Undead as a free action, targeting the creature you identified. Any time you get a critical success to Frighten Undead, if the target's level is lower than yours, the target is [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) for 1 round.
